titles.title: I'm so glad Jesus set me free

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I'm so glad
Jesus set me free,
I'm so glad
Jesus set me free,
I'm so glad
Jesus set me free,
singing glory, hallelujah,
Jesus set me free.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
I'm so glad Jesus lifted me,
I'm so glad Jesus lifted me,
I'm so glad Jesus lifted me,
Singing, glory, hallelujah,
Jesus set me free.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
I'm on my way to heaven
shouting victory
I'm on my way to heaven
shouting victory
singing glory, hallelujah,
Jesus set me free.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Satan had me bound,
but Jesus set me free
Satan had me bound,
but Jesus set me free
singing glory, hallelujah,
Jesus set me free.
